thread.title: Westworld Star in Talks to Join Han Solo Standalone Film
thread.title_full: Westworld Star in Talks to Join Han Solo Standalone Film

author: Jay Jayson
title: Westworld Star in Talks to Join Han Solo Standalone Film
text:
Westworld Star in Talks to Join Han Solo Standalone Film Jay Jayson - 02/10/2017 
Lucasfilm and Disney are in negotiations with Thandie Newton for a role in Han Solo: A Star Wars Story ., according to Variety . The site added, "Newtonâ€™s character is unknown." 
The 44-year-old British actress is best known for playing beautiful, razor-sharp madam Maeve Millay in HBO's Westworld , as well as her film roles in The Pursuit of Happyness and Mission: Impossible II . 
Developing... 
Han Solo: A Star Wars Story is filming now under directors Phil Lord and Chris Miller for a 2018 release (no specific date has been officially announced). Alden Ehrenreich stars as a young Han Solo in the era before Star Wars: A New Hope , before he met Leia and Luke and embarked on a galaxy-saving adventure. Donald Glover also stars as Lando Calrissian, with Woody Harrelson and Emilia Clarke in as-yet-unrevealed co-starring roles. ---
